product_title: Dr.Melaxin Peel Shot Glow Rice Peeling Ampoule 80ml

overall_perception_summary.headline: Viral Clinical Validation
overall_perception_summary.description: Dr.Melaxin executes a 'Viral Clinical' strategy, merging the sterile authority of a dermatological brand with the visceral 'gross-out' proof of TikTok trends. By using 'Real Dead Skin' visuals as the ultimate truth anchor, it democratizes professional-grade exfoliation for the mass market ($19.99/80ml). It is not a luxury experience; it is a high-volume mechanical fix for the skeptic who needs to see the debris to believe the clean.

foundation.title: The Natural Harmonizer
foundation.description: The brand anchors its authority in Nature (Rice Extract) but directs it toward a specific Fixing mission (removing dead skin/blackheads). By framing aggressive exfoliation as 'Gentle Rice-Based,' it occupies The Harmonizer territory—promising to fix the problem without the harshness usually associated with chemical peels. The 'Value Hacker' positioning ($19.99 for a massive 80ml) makes this correction accessible to everyone.

identity.title: The Reliable Magician
identity.description: The identity is a hybrid of The Reliable Expert (Dr. name, clinical percentages) and The Performer (Magician archetype showing 'Real Dead Skin' transformation). The Visual Identity is pure Pharma-Code—sterile, white, and red—signaling safety to offset the 'peeling' promise. The tone is Clinical Authority, using precise defensive language ('not product clumping') to validate the magic trick.

communication.title: Visceral Problem Solver
communication.description: Messaging acts as The Problem Solver, hooking the user with the 'End Benefit' (Removal) using Rational/Data persuasion (microscopic before/afters). The narrative is The Lab Breakthrough, centering on a scientific formulation ('Peel Shot') rather than a founder's journey. The KSP strategy is Viral Results, leveraging the crowd ('100M+ Views') and visual shock ('Real Dead Skin') as the primary truth.

benefits.title: Corrective Intelligence
benefits.description: Functionally, this is Correction—changing the skin's texture and pore count. Emotionally, it delivers Intelligence (The Savvy Choice)—making the user feel smart for buying a viral, high-efficacy product at a value price. Socially, it is The Safe Choice, backed by massive review volume and 'No.1' badges that signal it is the default solution for the herd.

marker_1.slider_a_label: [SLIDER] ORIGIN OF AUTHORITY (The Source of Power)
marker_1.reasoning: The authority is grounded in 'Rice Extract' and 'Pentarice' (Bio-Active), framing nature as the engine. However, the mission is explicitly 'removing dead skin cells' and 'blackheads' (Restoration/Fixing). This combination—using nature to gently fix a pathology—maps to The Harmonizer: restoring the skin's state through biological balance rather than harsh chemical warfare.
marker_1.evidence: Enriched with Pentarice... removes dead skin cells, blackheads... Gentle rice-based exfoliation... naturally derived

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (4/5 Bio-Active) + Slider B (2/5 Restoration) matches typical pattern for Territory 3 - The Harmonizer. Natural origin used for gentle restoration/fixing fits the territory definition.

marker_2.reasoning: The scope is laser-focused on micro-correction: 'Pore Care,' 'Blackhead Remover,' and 'Dead Skin.' It is not selling a lifestyle; it is selling a fix (Scope: 1/5). The access is radically democratic—$19.99 for a massive 80ml size (nearly 3x standard serum size) and 'TikTok Shop No.1' branding signals universal availability (Access: 5/5).
marker_2.evidence: $19.99... 80ml... TikTok Shop No.1 Beauty Best Seller... For all skin types

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Micro-Correction) + Slider B (5/5 Democratic) matches typical pattern for Territory 1 - The Democratizers. Specific fix + mass access is the definition of this territory.

marker_3.reasoning: Despite 'Gentle' claims, the core value prop is visible performance: '193% reduction sebum,' 'Improves Blackheads 178%.' They prioritize proving potency (Performance: 4/5). The transparency strategy is Evidence-First, using microscopic 'Real Dead Skin' imagery and exact clinical percentages to prove the mechanism is real, not just marketing fluff (Transparency: 2/5).
marker_3.evidence: Improves Blackheads 178%... 193% reduction sebum... This is pushed-out real dead skin... Clinical results show improvement

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (4/5 High-Performance) + Slider B (2/5 Evidence-First) matches typical pattern for Territory 2 - Radical Transparency. High claims + heavy data/visual proof aligns perfectly.

marker_4.reasoning: The visual code is purely sterile: white backgrounds, red clinical text, microscopic cross-sections, and the name 'Dr.Melaxin' (Aesthetic: 1/5). The value proposition is utility-driven: a large 80ml 'Daily' format for under $20 implies a commodity tool rather than a luxury investment (Value: 1/5). This is the pharmacy shelf, not the spa.
marker_4.evidence: Dr.Melaxin... 80ml Daily Soft Exfoliating... Clinical results... BEWARE OF COUNTERFEIT PRODUCTS

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Sterile) + Slider B (1/5 Utility) matches typical pattern for Territory 1 - The Medical Authority. Clinical aesthetics + utility pricing creates the Pharmacy positioning.

marker_5.reasoning: The brand does not try to be your friend; it acts as a specialist issuing a report. The language is factual and defensive ('not a phenomenon of the product clumping'), creating distance (Warmth: 2/5). The stance is high authority, citing 'Clinical Test Reports' and issuing warnings about counterfeits (Authority: 4/5). It commands trust through competence, not charm.
marker_5.evidence: *Excerpt from Dr. Melaxin Peel Shot Ampoule Clinical Test Report... This is pushed-out real dead skin... BEWARE OF COUNTERFEIT PRODUCTS

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Distant) + Slider B (4/5 Specialist) matches typical pattern for Territory 3 - The Reliable Expert. Low warmth + high authority aligns with the 'Doctor' persona.

marker_6.reasoning: The primary energy is The Magician (60%) because the core promise is a visual transformation trick: applying the ampoule and seeing 'Real Dead Skin' instantly appear. This is supported by The Sage (20%) which provides the 'Dr.' authority and clinical data ('178% improvement') to prove the magic is real science. The Everyman (20%) grounds it in mass accessibility ($19.99, 'For All Skin Types'), preventing it from feeling elite.
marker_6.evidence: This is pushed-out real dead skin... Transforms skin into a clean and healthy texture... Improves Blackheads 178%... TikTok Shop No.1

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Marker 6 uses percentage distribution. Dominance of Magician puts this in Territory 1 (The Performer/Transformation).

marker_7.reasoning: The text does not joke. It uses grave warnings ('BEWARE OF COUNTERFEIT') and dry, defensive explanations ('not a phenomenon of the product clumping'). This is the voice of a lab report: low humor (1/5), standard professional formality (3/5), and dry enthusiasm (2/5) that focuses on accuracy rather than hype. Even the 'Viral' claims are presented as data points.
marker_7.evidence: This is pushed-out real dead skin, not a phenomenon of the product clumping together... Excerpt from Dr. Melaxin Peel Shot Ampoule Clinical Test Report

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Humor (1) + Enthusiasm (2) + Formality (3) meets the hard rule for Territory 1 - The Clinical Authority.

marker_8.reasoning: The palette is overwhelmingly sterile: white backgrounds, black text, and clinical red highlights (Thermostat: 1/5). The layout is rigid and structured, using split-screen comparisons and grid layouts to present data (Entropy: 2/5). There is no artistic chaos; everything is organized to look like a medical diagram.
marker_8.evidence: White background... Red text highlights... Microscopic skin imaging... Grid layout... Dotted analysis circles
marker_8.look_and_feel: Clinical, evidence-based, and results-driven with a focus on microscopic verification.
marker_8.primary_palette: Clinical white and black base with bold red accents for data visualization.

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Sterile) + Slider B (2/5 Structured) matches typical pattern for Territory 1 - Pharma-Code. Clinical sterility + orderly layout aligns with medical/pharma aesthetic.

marker_9.reasoning: The hook is the result: 'Peel Shot,' 'Removes dead skin,' 'Blackhead Remover' (Hook: 4/5). The persuasion is entirely rational, explaining *how* it works ('draws out only the impurities') and proving it with rational evidence ('178% improvement'). It identifies a pain point (dead skin/blackheads) and solves it mechanically.
marker_9.evidence: Removes dead skin cells, blackheads... It works by targeting and drawing out only the impurities... Improves Blackheads 178%

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (4/5 Result) + Slider B (2/5 Rational) matches typical pattern for Territory 2 - The Problem Solver. Focus on result + rational logic aligns with functional problem-solving content.

marker_10.reasoning: The protagonist is the institution 'Dr.Melaxin' and the 'Clinical Test Report' authors—faceless expertise (Protagonist: 1/5). The setting is the lab, signified by microscopic skin imagery, ampoule droppers, and molecular chain graphics (Setting: 1/5). There is no founder story or garden origin; this is a product born in a beaker.
marker_10.evidence: Dr.Melaxin... Clinical Test Report... Microscopic skin imaging... Molecular structure overlay

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Nobel) + Slider B (1/5 Sterile) matches typical pattern for Territory 1 - The Lab Breakthrough. Institutional hero + lab setting aligns with intellectual origin story.

marker_11.reasoning: The primary validator is 'The Fans'—signaled by 'TikTok Shop No.1' and '100M+ TikTok Viral Views' badges (Validator: 5/5). The proof type is Visual—specifically the visceral 'Real Dead Skin' photos and microscopic before/afters (Proof: 3/5). While clinical data exists, the *viral* nature of the dead skin visual is the true selling point.
marker_11.evidence: 100M+ TikTok Viral Views... TikTok Shop No.1 Beauty Best Seller... Real Dead Skin... Before/After microscopic images

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (5/5 Fans) + Slider B (3/5 Visual) matches typical pattern for Territory 3 - Viral Results. Viral validation + visual proof aligns with outcomes-based trust.

marker_12.slider_a_label: [SLIDER] THE OWNERSHIP CLAIM (What Makes You Unique)
marker_12.slider_a_position_name: ▼ The Hero Ingredient (Owned mental link: 'We are the Oat brand')
marker_12.slider_b_label: [SLIDER] THE TARGET SCOPE (How Wide Is The Net?)
marker_12.reasoning: The brand claims ownership of 'Black Rice' as the hero ingredient (Ownership: 2/5). However, the scope is defined by its radical value: offering a professional-grade 'Peel Shot' in an 80ml bulk format for $19.99 (Scope: 1/5). This combination of specific ingredient focus and aggressive price/value ratio fits The Value Hacker—democratizing clinical ingredients.
marker_12.evidence: Key ingredient: BLACK RICE... 80ml... $19.99... Exfoliating Black Rice Ampoule

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Hero Ingredient) + Slider B (1/5 Price Leader) matches typical pattern for Territory 3 - The Value Hacker. Ingredient ownership + price leadership aligns with efficiency positioning.

marker_13.reasoning: The content is heavy on explanation: defining 'Gommage Peeling,' explaining 'Real Dead Skin vs Product Clumping,' and showing step-by-step usage (Depth: 2/5). The intent is to provide Evidence through clinical test excerpts and microscopic imagery (Intent: 2/5). It's a classroom lesson on why this specific exfoliation method works.
marker_13.evidence: How to use... This is pushed-out real dead skin... Microscopic before/afters... Excerpt from Clinical Test Report

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Explainer) + Slider B (2/5 Evidence) matches typical pattern for Territory 1 - Science Education. Educational depth + evidentiary intent aligns with mechanism focus.

marker_14.reasoning: The product is a 'Fixer'—it aggressively removes dead skin, reduces blackheads by 178%, and unclogs pores (Action: 5/5). The goal is aesthetic perfection: 'Glow,' 'Radiant,' 'Brightening,' and smoother texture (Outcome: 4/5). It is not just about health; it is about visibly correcting flaws to achieve a perfect surface.
marker_14.evidence: Removes dead skin cells... Improves Blackheads 178%... Brightening Care... Glow Rice Peeling

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (5/5 Fixer) + Slider B (4/5 Aesthetic) matches typical pattern for Territory 4 - Correction. High repair action + aesthetic goal aligns with perfection-focused benefits.

marker_15.slider_a_position_name: ▼ Contentment (The feeling of a job well done)
marker_15.slider_b_position_name: ▼ Savvy (I feel smart/validated for choosing this)
marker_15.reasoning: The emotional payoff is the feeling of 'Contentment' from seeing the dead skin come off—visual confirmation that the job is done (Anxiety: 3/5). But socially, it appeals to 'Savvy'—you are the smart shopper who found the #1 Viral product that actually works, unlike counterfeit or ineffective alternatives (Self-Perception: 4/5). It sells the confidence of a smart purchase.
marker_15.evidence: 100M+ TikTok Viral Views... Cardi B’s Pick... Beware of counterfeit products... Clinical results

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (3/5 Contentment) + Slider B (4/5 Savvy) matches specific rule for Territory 4 - Intelligence. Validation of smart choice aligns with performance-based emotion.

marker_16.slider_a_position_name: ▼ The Balance (works well and looks good)
marker_16.reasoning: The purchase motivation is a balance of utility (it peels skin) and status (it's a TikTok hit) (Signal: 3/5). The tribal orientation is strictly 'Trending'—anchored by the 'TikTok Shop No.1' badge and '100M+ Views' claim. Buying this says 'I am plugged into what is currently working and viral' (Tribal: 2/5).
marker_16.evidence: TikTok Shop No.1 Beauty Best Seller... 100M+ TikTok Viral Views... Cardi B’s Pick

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (3/5 Balance) + Slider B (2/5 Trending) falls into Territory 2 - The Trend-Setter. Trending tribal orientation drives the territory assignment towards Relevance.

marker_17.slider_a_position_name: ▼ Normalization ('I want to look like everyone else')
marker_17.reasoning: Despite the 'Viral' tag, the social signal is actually safety in numbers. '#1 Best Seller,' '7,000+ ratings,' and '100M views' tell the user: 'Everyone is using this, so it must work.' It invites the user to join The Majority (Group: 1/5) and Normalize their purchase behavior by following the crowd (Vector: 1/5). It removes the risk of trying a peel.
marker_17.evidence: 7,428 global ratings... #1 in Facial Peels... TikTok Shop No.1 Beauty Best Seller... 100M+ Views

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Normalization) + Slider B (1/5 Majority) matches typical pattern for Territory 1 - The Safe Choice. Assimilation goal + majority scale aligns with belonging/safety.
